Shop today for the festive season and only pay in February 2022!
It’s time to celebrate! Get ready for the festive season and spoil your loved ones with great gifts – and only pay your first instalment in February 2022!
How shop today, pay in February 2022 works
If you are one of our existing, qualifying customers shopping using your account, you will pay nothing for the product you buy today until February 2022, when your first monthly credit payment is due. What’s more, you will be charged NO interest during this time.

We hope this payment holiday helps ease the burden of all the many expenses over the festive season and the start of the new year!
